dzlta.configuration.title: Lighter Than Air Configs
advancements.dzlta.root.title: Lighter Than Air
advancements.dzlta.get_weather_vane.titl: Which Way Does the Wind Blow?
advancements.dzlta.get_weather_vane.desc: Craft a Weather Vane to read the wind's direction
gamerule.windEnabled.description: Enables or disables the wind mechanics.
gamerule.windLockDirection.description: Locks the wind direction, preventing it from changing dynamically.
gamerule.windSetDirection.description: Manually sets the wind direction (0-7, 0=N). Takes effect immediately. If not locked, resets the change timer.
gamerule.windDirectionBaseInterval.descr: The minimum time (in seconds) before the wind direction changes.
gamerule.windDirectionRandomInterval.des: Maximum random time (in seconds) added to the base interval for wind changes.
gamerule.windDirectionChaoticStorms.desc: If enabled, wind changes direction much more frequently during thunderstorms.
gamerule.windStrengthEnabled.description: Enables or disables the wind strength mechanic.
gamerule.windLockStrength.description: Locks the wind strength, preventing it from changing dynamically.
gamerule.windSetStrength.description: Manually sets the wind strength (0-4). Takes effect immediately. If not locked, resets the change timer.
gamerule.windStrengthBaseInterval.descri: The minimum time (in seconds) before the wind strength changes.
gamerule.windStrengthRandomInterval.desc: Maximum random time (in seconds) added to the base interval for wind strength changes.
gamerule.windStrengthChaoticStorms.descr: If enabled, wind strength is forced to max (4) during thunderstorms.
